resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104542</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104542</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206106</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Solar Eclipse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solareklipse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éclipse Solaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Eclipse Solar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Eclipse Solare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλιακή έκλειψη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Eclipse Solar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">explains what to look for during a solar eclipse, how to create a pinhole projector (for safely viewing an eclipse), why eclipses happen, a world map of future eclipses, and archives of webcasts of past eclipses in Greece (2004), the U.S. (2002), and more.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erklärt was, während einer Solareklipse zu 
suchen, wie man einen Splintlochprojektor (für eine Eklipse sicher 
ansehen), warum Eklipsen geschehen, eine Weltkarte der zukünftigen 
Eklipsen und Archive von webcasts der letzten Eklipsen in Griechenland
(2004), die US herstellt. (2002) und mehr.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">explique quoi rechercher pendant une éclipse 
solaire, comment créer un projecteur de trou d'épingle (pour 
visualiser sans risque une éclipse), pourquoi les éclipses se 
produisent, une carte du monde de futures éclipses, et les archives 
des webcasts des éclipses passées en Grèce (2004), États-Unis. 
(2002), et plus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">explica o que procurar durante um eclipse solar, 
como criar um projetor do pinhole (para com segurança ver um 
eclipse), porque os eclipses acontecem, um mapa do mundo dos eclipses 
futuros, e os arquivos dos webcasts de eclipses passados em Greece 
(2004), os E. U.. (2002), e mais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">spiega che cosa cercare durante l'eclipse solare, 
come creare un proiettore di foro di spillo (per sicuro l'esame 
dell'eclipse), perchè le eclipse accadono, un programma del mondo 
delle eclipse future e gli archivi dei webcasts delle eclipse passate 
in Grecia (2004), Stati Uniti. (2002) e più.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξηγεί τι να ψάξει κατά τη διάρκεια μιας ηλιακής 
έκλειψης, πώς να δημιουργήσει έναν προβολέα οπών καρφίτσας (για
ακίνδυνα να εμφανίσει μια έκλειψη), γιατί οι εκλείψεις 
συμβαίνουν, ένας παγκόσμιος χάρτης των μελλοντικών εκλείψεων, 
και αρχεία των webcasts των προηγούμενων εκλείψεων στην Ελλάδα 
(2004), τις ΗΠΑ (2002), και περισσότερο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">explica qué buscar durante un eclipse solar, 
cómo crear un proyector del agujero de alfiler (para con seguridad 
ver un eclipse), porqué suceden los eclipses, una correspondencia del
mundo de los eclipses futuros, y los archivos de los webcasts de 
últimos eclipses en Grecia (2004), los E.E.U.U.. (2002), y 
más.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206106</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104542</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/solar-eclipse</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
